department: Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
short_summary: Accessory for optical device, Misc optical component
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of the Ministry of National Defence, is issuing this request for proposition (RFP)…
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**
===============

**Title** | **Synopsis**
---------| -----------
6 in. UV-IR Collimator | Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites bids for a 6-inch UV-IR collimator, to be delivered in Valcartier, Quebec, Canada.

**Contract Details** 
-----------------

* Reference Number: WS4115810355-Doc4115843525
* Amendment Number: 2
* Solicitation Number: WS4115810355
* Publication Date: August 14th, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: September 7th, 2023, at 2:00 PM local time
* Amendment Date: August 21st, 2023
* Expected Contract Start Date: September 1st, 2023
* Tender Status: Expired

**Procurement Information** 
-------------------------

* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: None
* Regions of Delivery: Quebec
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Description of Goods** 
-------------------------

The procurement consists of a 6-inch UV-IR collimator, to be delivered in Valcartier, Quebec, Canada. This product is to be used by Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC). The exact requirements for the product are detailed in Annex “Statement of Requirements”.

**Contact Information** 
-------------------------

For more information or to submit a bid, please contact:

* Francois S. Martineau, SPAC/PSPC
* Email: [francois.s.martineau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:francois.s.martineau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Note** 
-----

This tender announcement is available on the Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) website, along with any supporting documents. Bidders are responsible for monitoring the PSPC website for any updates or changes to this tender announcement. [Access the tender notice here](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17161260?extsite=MTcxNjEyNjBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).
